name: The Dead Girls - "She Laughed A Little" - EP
description:
The Dead Girls' newest "hit song" that will never be heard on the radio (ha!) is called "She Laughed a Little," and it has become a staple of the bands' live shows. Since we put out the full-length "Out of Earshot" LP in 2010, Rocket Heart Records been itching to do a 7-inch with the band. When they went into Art House Studios to record "She Laughed a Little," we knew we had the perfect single. It's full of the upbeat, hooky rock that The Dead Girls are known for, and is guaranteed to get stuck in your head all day.

The B-side, "It's All Happening," is a treat as well. It's a one-off song written and recorded in four hours when Motion City Soundtrack singer/guitarist Justin Pierre came into town for a day. The Dead Girls then called up former Blackpool Lights/Creature Comforts/Ultimate Fakebook multi-instrumentalist J.D. Warnock to create a three-vocal/four guitar/six-man wall of sound. The epic super-catchy thumper of a song has since been remixed and remastered exclusively for this release. Simply put, it rocks.

Limited pressing of 500 records divided into 400 black and 100 red/black swirl. Includes a digital download of the EP, plus 2 bonus tracks!

Track List:

01. She Laughed A Little
02. It's Happening (Featuring: Justin Pierre and JD Warnock)

name: Ultimate Fakebook - "Electric Kissing Parties" - LP
description: Rocket Heart Records is pleased to announce the first vinyl release of Ultimate Fakebook’s groundbreaking first album Electric Kissing Parties. This limited pressing of 400 black and 100 red copies will feature the original cover art and the exclusive bonus track “Rocket Heart’s On Fire,” an unreleased song recorded at the same time as the album. Electric Kissing Parties was originally released in 1997 on CD and includes cult-favorite pop gems such as "Far, Far Away," "Diamond Ring," and "Downstairs/Arena Rock." Available In Stores: January 2011 Track List: 01. Far, Far Away 02. Diamond Ring 03. All The New Poisons 04. Roll (Electric Kissing Parties pt. 1) 05. Downstairs/Arena Rock 06. Having Too Much Fun 07. Circus Horrors 08. Liferaft Halo 09. You Won't See Us 10. Silver Date 11. Rocket Heart's On Fire (Previously Unreleased)

name: The Dead Girls - "Out Of Earshot" - LP
description:
The Dead Girls “Out of Earshot,” released on vinyl and digital download by Rocket Heart Records, is the band’s attempt to achieve the ultimate balance of energetic dual-guitar rock and sincere pop that acknowledges the
past but looks to the future. The past year has been a busy one for The Dead Girls, who self-released two EPs and opened up for artists like Brendan Benson, Motion City Soundtrack, and Kiss—yes, that Kiss.

Limited 500 pressings; 300 black, 200 orange, with a gatefold cover, and including a digital download of the entire album.

Featuring Nick Colby and Eric Melin of Ultimate Fakebook

Track List:

01. Later
02. Te Quiero
03. Hair Trigger
04. Why The Sun Kills The Moon
05. What's Another Day
06. You Ignited
07. Pulling Teeth
08. She Can Turn It Off
09. Out Of Earshot
10. Last Words
11. I Am Never Wrong
12. Look At Her
